Question
========

We draw a random sample among 1000 adults. Suppose *X* is the number of people in the sample living unmarried with a partner. The probability that at least ¼ of this sample is unmarried cohabitation can be written as:

Answerlist
----------

* P (X≥1/4)
* P (X≤250)
* P (X≥250)
* P (X≤ 750)
* P (X≤ 1000)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P (X≥1/4): Incorrect
* P (X≤250): Incorrect
* P (X≥250): Correct
* P (X≤ 750): Incorrect
* P (X≤ 1000): Incorrect
